FacileFormsPackage.name: samples.english
FacileFormsPackage.title: ClassicMode Sample Package
FacileFormsPackage.author: Markus Bopp
FacileFormsPackage.description: These are the original samples that come with BreezingForms (former FacileForms)
FacileFormsPackage.copyright: This BreezingForms package is released under the GNU/GPL license

form.name: SampleContactForm
form.title: Contact form
form.description: This sample is a basic contact form everybody should be able to master. It does not require any scripting skills to make such a form.

element.name: cf_email
element.title: Email
element.script3msg: Please enter your valid email address.

element.name: cf_note
element.title: Note
element.data2: We confirm that your email address will be only used for handling this contact request\x2C and it will not be made availabe to any 3rd party.

form.name: SampleTabNavigation
form.title: Using tabs for page navigation
form.description: Demonstrates how you can build a dialog with tabs for each page. It also shows another reasonable use of rectangles besides framing and highlighting contents.

element.name: pane1intro
element.title: Intro
element.data1: \x3Ch1\x3ETab Sample\x3C/h1\x3E\r\n\x3Cp\x3EThis demonstrates how you can build a dialogue with tabs for each page. It also shows another reasonable use of rectangles besides framing and highlighting contents.\x3C/p\x3E

form.name: SampleCountrySelect
form.title: Country selection
form.description: Shows the interaction between logically connected select lists\x2C as well as dynamic replacement of select list options. Not really stuff for rookies.

element.name: CselState
element.title: State

form.name: SamplePieceApp
form.title: Piece sending mail
form.description: Shows how a piece can be used to send a mail to an arbitraty address. \r\nIt takes the fields email\x2C subject and message from the form to send a mail.
form.piece3code:
// declare globals used in this piece
global $mosConfig_mailfrom\x2C $mosConfig_fromname\x3B

// include FacileForms standard library
$this-\x3EexecPieceByName(\x27ff_InitLib\x27)\x3B

// send the mail
$this-\x3EsendMail(
 $mosConfig_mailfrom\x2C // email addr of submitter (1)
 $mosConfig_fromname.\x27 - Message\x27\x2C // name of submitter (1)
 ff_getSubmit(\x27email\x27)\x2C // email of recipient (2)
 ff_getSubmit(\x27subject\x27)\x2C // subject of the mail (3)
 ff_getSubmit(\x27message\x27) // body of the mail (3)
)\x3B

/*--------------------------------------------------------------------
Notes:

(1) In this sample we use the site admin as submitter of the email\x2C
 but basicly you could use anything. Note that many mail servers 
 however impose constraints about the submitters email address and
 in case refuse to sent the mail to prevent from spamming. (This
 will mostly be reported as \x27relaying denied\x27).

(2) Recipient can also be an array of email addresses if you want to 
 send the same mail to multiple recipients. Note that all email
 adresses will however be visible to all recipients\x2C so maybe
 it is better to call $this-\x3EsendMail for each recipient 
 individually.

(3) Subject and body could of cause also be composed here in the 
 piece instead of taking it completely from the submitted values.
--------------------------------------------------------------------*/

element.name: email
element.title: Recipient
element.script3msg: Please enter a valid email address.

form.name: SampleEmbeddedCode
form.title: Embedded php code
form.description: Demonstrates the use of embedded php code in various ways.

element.name: userlist
element.title: Userlist
element.data2:
1\x3BSelect user\x3Bnone
\x3C?php
/*
 This php code is executed while the page is created.
 It queries the userlist by sql and creates options for the select list.
*/
$users = ff_select(\x22select name\x2C username from #__users order by name\x22)\x3B
$options = \x27\x27\x3B
if ($users)
 foreach ($users as $user) 
 $options .= \x220\x3B$user-\x3Ename\x3B$user-\x3Eusername\x5Cn\x22\x3B
return $options\x3B
?\x3E

form.name: RnrContestRegist
form.title: Rock\x27N\x27Roll dance contest registration
form.description: This is the registration form for the Rock\x27N\x27Roll dance contest. Every site member can make one registration only in this sample. Existing registrations can be edited.
form.piece1code:
//+trace dis

// load the standard form creation utilities
$this-\x3EexecPieceByName(\x27ff_InitLib\x27)\x3B

// create table if it does not yet exist
ff_query(
 \x22CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__rnr_contest` (\x22.
 \x22`id` INT( 11 ) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT \x2C\x22.
 \x22`userid` INT( 11 ) DEFAULT \x270\x27 NOT NULL \x2C\x22.
 \x22`couple` VARCHAR( 50 ) NOT NULL \x2C\x22.
 \x22`age` TINYINT( 1 ) DEFAULT \x270\x27 NOT NULL \x2C\x22.
 \x22`acro` TINYINT( 1 ) DEFAULT \x270\x27 NOT NULL \x2C\x22.
 \x22`fun` TINYINT( 1 ) DEFAULT \x270\x27 NOT NULL \x2C\x22.
 \x22`boogie` TINYINT( 1 ) DEFAULT \x270\x27 NOT NULL\x2C\x22.
 \x22PRIMARY KEY (`id`)\x22.
 \x22) TYPE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=1\x22
)\x3B

// load old record if any
global $record\x3B
$rows = ff_select(\x22select * from `#__rnr_contest` where userid=\x22.JFactory::getUser()-\x3Eget(\x27id\x27\x2C0))\x3B
if (count($rows)) {
 $record = $rows[0]\x3B
 ff_setChecked(\x27age\x27\x2C $record-\x3Eage)\x3B
 if ($record-\x3Eacro ) ff_setChecked(\x27acro\x27 \x2C\x271\x27)\x3B
 if ($record-\x3Efun ) ff_setChecked(\x27fun\x27 \x2C\x271\x27)\x3B
 if ($record-\x3Eboogie) ff_setChecked(\x27boogie\x27\x2C\x271\x27)\x3B
} else
 $record = NULL\x3B
form.piece3code:
//+trace dis

// load the standard submit utilities
$this-\x3EexecPieceByName(\x27ff_InitLib\x27)\x3B

// retrieve the submitted values
$recordid = ff_getSubmit(\x27recordid\x27)\x3B
$userid = JFactory::getUser()-\x3Eget(\x27id\x27\x2C0)\x3B
$couple = ff_getSubmit(\x27couple\x27\x2C \x27\x27)\x3B
$age = ff_getSubmit(\x27age\x27\x2C 0)\x3B
$acro = ff_getSubmit(\x27acro\x27\x2C 0)\x3B
$fun = ff_getSubmit(\x27fun\x27\x2C 0)\x3B
$boogie = ff_getSubmit(\x27boogie\x27\x2C 0)\x3B

if (is_numeric($recordid))
 // update existing record
 ff_query(
 \x22update `#__rnr_contest` \x22.
 \x22set `couple` = \x27$couple\x27\x2C \x22.
 \x22`age` = \x27$age\x27\x2C \x22.
 \x22`acro` = \x27$acro\x27\x2C \x22.
 \x22`fun` = \x27$fun\x27\x2C \x22.
 \x22`boogie` = \x27$boogie\x27 \x22.
 \x22where `id` = $recordid\x22
 )\x3B
else
 // save new record
 ff_query(
 \x22insert into `#__rnr_contest` \x22.
 \x22(`userid`\x2C `couple`\x2C `age`\x2C `acro`\x2C `fun`\x2C `boogie`) \x22.
 \x22values (\x27$userid\x27\x2C \x27$couple\x27\x2C \x27$age\x27\x2C \x27$acro\x27\x2C \x27$fun\x27\x2C \x27$boogie\x27)\x22
 )\x3B

element.name: participants
element.title: Participants
element.data2:
$rows = ff_select(
 \x22select \x22.
 \x22c.id as id\x2C \x22.
 \x22c.userid as userid\x2C \x22.
 \x22u.name as user\x2C \x22.
 \x22c.couple as couple\x2C \x22.
 \x22c.age as age\x2C \x22.
 \x22c.acro as acro\x2C \x22.
 \x22c.fun as fun\x2C \x22.
 \x22c.boogie as boogie \x22.
 \x22from #__rnr_contest as c \x22.
 \x22left join #__users as u on c.userid = u.id \x22.
 \x22order by user\x2C couple\x22
)\x3B
element.data3:
ID\x26id\x26\x26\x26\x26\x260\x260\x262\x260\x260\x262\x260\x260\x26\x5Cx3C?php return $value\x3B ?\x5Cx3E
User ID\x26userid\x26\x26\x26\x26\x260\x260\x262\x260\x260\x262\x260\x260\x26\x5Cx3C?php return $value\x3B ?\x5Cx3E
User\x26user\x26\x26\x26\x2680\x260\x261\x261\x260\x260\x260\x260\x260\x26\x5Cx3C?php return $value\x3B ?\x5Cx3E
Couple\x26couple\x26\x26\x26\x26150\x260\x261\x261\x260\x260\x260\x260\x260\x26\x5Cx3C?php return htmlentities($value)\x3B ?\x5Cx3E
Age\x26age\x26\x26\x26\x2640\x260\x261\x261\x260\x260\x260\x260\x260\x26\x5Cx3C?php if ($value==1) return \x5Cx22Junior\x5Cx22\x3B else return \x5Cx22Adult\x5Cx22\x3B ?\x5Cx3E
Acro RnR\x26acro\x26\x26\x26\x2630\x260\x261\x262\x260\x260\x262\x260\x260\x26\x5Cx3C?php\x5Cnif ($value)\x5Cn return\x5Cn \x5Cx27\x5Cx3Cimg src=\x5Cx22{mossite}/administrator/images/tick.png\x5Cx22/\x5Cx3E\x5Cx27\x3B\x5Cn?\x5Cx3E
Fun RnR\x26fun\x26\x26\x26\x2630\x260\x261\x262\x260\x260\x262\x260\x260\x26\x5Cx3C?php\x5Cnif ($value)\x5Cn return\x5Cn \x5Cx27\x5Cx3Cimg src=\x5Cx22{mossite}/administrator/images/tick.png\x5Cx22/\x5Cx3E\x5Cx27\x3B\x5Cn?\x5Cx3E
Boogie Woogie\x26boogie\x26\x26\x26\x2630\x260\x261\x262\x260\x260\x262\x260\x260\x26\x5Cx3C?php\x5Cnif ($value)\x5Cn return\x5Cn \x5Cx27\x5Cx3Cimg src=\x5Cx22{mossite}/administrator/images/tick.png\x5Cx22/\x5Cx3E\x5Cx27\x3B\x5Cn?\x5Cx3E

form.name: SubmitContent
form.title: Submit Content
form.description: This form shows how content can be submitted by users.

element.name: name
element.title: Name

element.name: section
element.title: Section
element.data2:
\x3C?php
$section = ff_getParam(\x27ff_param_section\x27\x2C 0)\x3B
$rows = ff_select(
 \x22select id\x2C title from #__sections \x22.
 \x22where published = 1 order by title\x22
 )\x3B
$flag = 0\x3B
$list = \x27\x27\x3B
if (!is_null($rows))
 foreach ($rows as $row)
 if ($row-\x3Eid==$section) {
 $flag = 1\x3B
 $list .= \x221\x3B$row-\x3Etitle\x3B$row-\x3Eid\x5Cr\x5Cn\x22\x3B
 } else
 $list .= \x220\x3B$row-\x3Etitle\x3B$row-\x3Eid\x5Cr\x5Cn\x22\x3B

if ($flag) return $list\x3B 
return \x221\x3BSelect Section\x3B\x27\x27\x5Cr\x5Cn\x22.$list\x3B
?\x3E
